original_title: SF adamant on not joining hands with RW
original_body_lines: While saying that Sri Lanka has descended into a state of chaos, MP Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka reiterated that he will not join hands with the government.

"Ranil Wickremesinghe is no different than what he was when he worked with us. We are not here to aid corruption and robbery. We are here to develop the country with a mandate from the people," Fonseka said, responding to the President's request for the Opposition to join hands with the government.
